ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound thick-cut bacon, cut into 1-inch chunks
1 pound Brussels sprouts, cut into 1/4-inch slices
¼ cup chopped, unsalted, and roasted almonds
¼ cup balsamic vinaigrette dressing, or to taste

cookingTips: Cook bacon until crispy, then reserve the rendered fat to cook Brussels sprouts for extra flavor
Shred Brussels sprouts very thinly with a knife or mandoline for better integration with other ingredients
Toss warm salad with dressing while components are still slightly warm to allow better flavor absorption
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This warm salad combines several textures. Would you like tips on timing components so everything is ready simultaneously?
